 Slough Borough Council election, 2016   
 From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia   
					Jump to:					 navigation , 					 search 
 This article  needs more  links to other articles  to help  integrate it into the encyclopedia .  Please help  improve this article  by adding links  that are relevant to the context  within the existing text.   (April 2017)   ( Learn how and when to remove this template message ) 
 The  2016 Slough Borough Council election  took place on 5 May 2016 to elect members of  Slough Borough Council  in England. [1] [2]  This was on the same day as other  local elections .

 This section is empty.   You can help by  adding to it .   (April 2017)
